channel.title: [508] heeelllppp!

item.title: [508] heeelllppp!
item.dc:creator: @lildude783 lildude783
item.description:
@lildude783 wrote:

hey… ok…

in my NPCOption1.java file npc speech file i have this command…

From NPCOption1.java 508 server

if(pnp.npcType == 5925)
{
if(p.NoMore == 0)
{
p.Dialogue = 0;
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 243);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9760, 243, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, 5925, 243, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, "Benny", 243, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, "#$#!$#$#$!#!#$", 243, 4);
p.frames.setString(p, "#$#!$#$#$!#!#$", 243, 5);
p.frames.setString(p, "#$#!$#$#$!#!#$", 243, 6);
} {
p.Dialogue = 0;
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 243);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9760, 243, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, 5925, 243, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, "Benny", 243, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, "#$#!$#$#$!#!#$", 243, 4);
p.frames.setString(p, "#$#!$#$#$!#!#$", 243, 5);
p.frames.setString(p, "#$#!$#$#$!#!#$", 243, 6);
} {
p.Dialogue = 0;
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 243);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9760, 243, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, 5925, 243, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, "Benny", 243, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, "#$#!$#$#$!#!#$", 243, 4);
p.frames.setString(p, "#$#!$#$#$!#!#$", 243, 5);
p.frames.setString(p, "#$#!$#$#$!#!#$", 243, 6);
p.NoMore = 1;
}
}

ok… i took the words and replaced them with #$#!$#@#$!#!#$, anyway…

instead of starting at the top… and when you click “click to continue” its supposed to go to the one under that… it just starts with the bottom one and doesnt continue -.-

could it be i have put in the wrong interface?, could it be that i have the code wrong?

btw, i made this code myself, so of course it’ll be wrong in some way

HELP PLEEZE[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 22, 2009, 05:47:01 pm[/size][hr]would it help if i offered REP?? for those who help me?
